verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> [gifts,] <S%G80>brethren,<s%> I do not <S%G2309>want<s%> you to be <S%G50>unaware.<s%>

You <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3753>when<s%> you were <S%G1484>pagans,<s%> [you were] <S%G520>led<s%> <S%G520>astray<s%> to the <S%G880>dumb<s%> <S%G1497>idols,<s%> <S%G5613>however<s%> <S%G302><s%> you were <S%G71>led.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> I <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to you, that <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus<s%> is <S%G331>accursed<s%>"; and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>" <S%G1508>except<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> there are <S%G1243>varieties<s%> of <S%G5486>gifts,<s%> but the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
And there are <S%G1243>varieties<s%> of <S%G1248>ministries,<s%> and the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
And there are <S%G1243>varieties<s%> of <S%G1755>effects,<s%> but the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> [persons.]
But to <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G5321>manifestation<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> for the <S%G4851>common<s%> <S%G4851>good.<s%>

For to <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and to <S%G243>another<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%>

to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> by the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and to <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G5486>gifts<s%> of <S%G2386>healing<s%> by the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%>

and to <S%G243>another<s%> the <S%G1755>effecting<s%> of <S%G1411>miracles,<s%> and to <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> and to <S%G243>another<s%> the <S%G1253>distinguishing<s%> of <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> [various] <S%G1085>kinds<s%> of <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> and to <S%G243>another<s%> the <S%G2058>interpretation<s%> of <S%G1100>tongues.<s%>

But <S%G1520>one<s%> and the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> <S%G1244>distributing<s%> to <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G2398>individually<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as He <S%G1014>wills.<s%>

For <S%G2509>even<s%> as the <S%G4983>body<s%> is <S%G1520>one<s%> and [yet] <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3196>members,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> of the <S%G4983>body,<s%> though they are <S%G4183>many,<s%> are <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For by <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> we were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> into <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G1401>slaves<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1658>free,<s%> and we were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4222>made<s%> to <S%G4222>drink<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
For the <S%G4983>body<s%> is not <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3196>member,<s%> but <S%G4183>many.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> the <S%G4228>foot<s%> should <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3754>"Because<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not a <S%G5495>hand,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not [a part] of the <S%G4983>body,<s%>" it is not for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3844>reason<s%> <S%G3756>any<s%> the <S%G3756>less<s%> [a part] of the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

And <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G3775>ear<s%> should <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3754>"Because<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not an <S%G3788>eye,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not [a part] of the <S%G4983>body,<s%>" it is not for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3844>reason<s%> <S%G3756>any<s%> the <S%G3756>less<s%> [a part] of the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> were an <S%G3788>eye,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> would the <S%G189>hearing<s%> be? <S%G1487>If<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> were <S%G189>hearing,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> would the <S%G3750>sense<s%> of <S%G3750>smell<s%> be?

But <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G5087>placed<s%> the <S%G3196>members,<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, in the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as He <S%G2309>desired.<s%>
And <S%G1487>if<s%> they were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3196>member,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> would the <S%G4983>body<s%> be?
But <S%G3568>now<s%> there are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3196>members,<s%> but <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>

And the <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> "I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of you"; <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> to the <S%G4228>feet,<s%> "I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of you."

On the <S%G235>contrary,<s%> it is <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>truer<s%> that the <S%G3196>members<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> which <S%G1380>seem<s%> to be <S%G772>weaker<s%> are <S%G316>necessary;<s%>

and those [members] of the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G1380>deem<s%> <S%G820>less<s%> <S%G820>honorable,<s%> on <S%G3778>these<s%> we <S%G4060>bestow<s%> <S%G4053>more<s%> <S%G4053>abundant<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> and our <S%G809>unseemly<s%> [members come to] <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4053>more<s%> <S%G4053>abundant<s%> <S%G2157>seemliness,<s%>

<S%G1161>whereas<s%> our <S%G2158>seemly<s%> [members] <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> [of it.] But <S%G2316>God<s%> has [so] <S%G4786>composed<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1325>giving<s%> <S%G4053>more<s%> <S%G4053>abundant<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> to that [member] which <S%G5302>lacked,<s%>

that there should be <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4978>division<s%> in the <S%G4983>body,<s%> but [that] the <S%G3196>members<s%> should <S%G3309>have<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3309>care<s%> for <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

And <S%G1535>if<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3196>member<s%> <S%G3958>suffers,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G4841>suffer<s%> with it; <S%G1535>if<s%> [one] <S%G3196>member<s%> is <S%G1392>honored,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G4796>rejoice<s%> with it.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> you are Christ's <S%G4983>body,<s%> and <S%G3313>individually<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> of it.

And <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G5087>appointed<s%> in the <S%G1577>church,<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G1320>teachers,<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G1411>miracles,<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G5486>gifts<s%> of <S%G2386>healings,<s%> <S%G484>helps,<s%> <S%G2941>administrations,<s%> [various] <S%G1085>kinds<s%> of <S%G1100>tongues.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> are not <S%G652>apostles,<s%> are they? <S%G3956>All<s%> are not <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> are they? <S%G3956>All<s%> are not <S%G1320>teachers,<s%> are they? <S%G3956>All<s%> are not [workers of] <S%G1411>miracles,<s%> are they?

<S%G3956>All<s%> do not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5486>gifts<s%> of <S%G2386>healings,<s%> do they? <S%G3956>All<s%> do not <S%G2980>speak<s%> with <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> do they? <S%G3956>All<s%> do not <S%G1329>interpret,<s%> do they?
But <S%G2206>earnestly<s%> <S%G2206>desire<s%> the <S%G3173>greater<s%> <S%G5486>gifts.<s%> And I <S%G1166>show<s%> you a <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G5236>more<s%> <S%G5236>excellent<s%> <S%G3598>way.<s%>
